instructions.1: ARRANGE pepperoni evenly over hot lasagna. Separate dough into breadsticks. Evenly place breadsticks lengthwise and crosswise over pepperoni, weaving to form a lattice top. Trim any excess dough that might be hanging from edge of pan. Sprinkle top of lattice with cheese. Place lasagna on a baking sheet.
instructions.2: BAKE in preheated 325 degrees F. oven for 25 to 35 minutes, or until breadsticks are golden brown and fully cooked.
instructions.3: Note: To make mini breadsticks, place left over dough on baking sheet with lasagna. Brush with melted butter, or olive oil. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown.

questions.question: In Step 2, is the breadsticks from Step 1 being used?
Is breadsticks from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is cheese from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the breadsticks in Step 2?
Can we arrange (Step 1) and bake (Step 2) at the same time?
